mapper.select: SELECT Q.QRN, Q.QNA_NO, Q.MEMBER_ID, Q.QNA_TITLE, Q.QNA_CONTENT, Q.QNA_CREATED, Q.QNA_MODIFIED FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC) AS QRN, QNA_NO, MEMBER_ID, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_CREATED, QNA_MODIFIED FROM QNA) Q WHERE Q.QRN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA (QNA_NO, MEMBER_ID, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_CREATED ,QNA_MODIFIED) VALUES (QNA_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{qnaTitle},#{qnaContent}, SYSDATE ,SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO QNA_REPLY (QNA_REPLY_NO, QNA_NO, MEMBER_ID, QNA_REPLY_CONTENT, QNA_REPLY_CREATED, QNA_REPLY_STATE, QNA_REPLY_DEPTH, QNA_REPLY_GROUP_NO, QNA_REPLY_GROUP_ORD) VALUES (QNA_REPLY_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{qnaNo}, #{memberId}, #{qnaReplyContent}, SYSDATE, 1, 0, QNA_REPLY_NO_SEQ.CURRVAL, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT QR.QRNS ,QR.QNA_REPLY_NO, QR.QNA_NO, QR.MEMBER_ID, QR.QNA_REPLY_CONTENT, QR.QNA_REPLY_CREATED, QR.QNA_REPLY_STATE, QR.QNA_REPLY_DEPTH,QR.QNA_REPLY_GROUP_NO, QR.QNA_REPLY_GROUP_ORD FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY QNA_REPLY_GROUP_NO DESC, QNA_REPLY_GROUP_ORD ) AS QRNS, QNA_REPLY_NO, QNA_NO, MEMBER_ID, QNA_REPLY_CONTENT, QNA_REPLY_CREATED, QNA_REPLY_STATE, QNA_REPLY_DEPTH,QNA_REPLY_GROUP_NO, QNA_REPLY_GROUP_ORD FROM QNA_REPLY) QR WHERE QNA_NO = #{qnaNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA_REPLY (QNA_REPLY_NO, QNA_NO, MEMBER_ID, QNA_REPLY_CONTENT, QNA_REPLY_CREATED, QNA_REPLY_STATE, QNA_REPLY_DEPTH, QNA_REPLY_GROUP_NO, QNA_REPLY_GROUP_ORD) VALUES (QNA_REPLY_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{qnaNo}, #{memberId}, #{qnaReplyContent}, SYSDATE, 1, #{qnaReplyDepth}, #{qnaReplyGroupNo}, #{qnaReplyGroupOrd})
